warning[CS0014]: Inputs to `LessThan` should typically be constrained to the input size
     /home/tom/development/state-of-zk-security-tools/zksec/bugs/zkbugs/dataset/circom/dependencies/circomlib/circuits/comparators.circom:125:18
    
122      component lt = LessThan(n);
         -------------------------- Circomlib template `LessThan` instantiated here.
    
125      lt.in[1] <== in[0];
                      ^^^^^ This input to `LessThan` should be constrained to `n` bits.
    
    = For more details, see https://github.com/trailofbits/circomspect/blob/main/doc/analysis_passes.md#unconstrained-less-than.
    = To ignore this type of result, use `--allow CS0014`.

warning[CS0005]: Using the signal assignment operator `<--` does not constrain the assigned signal.
    /home/tom/development/state-of-zk-security-tools/zksec/bugs/zkbugs/dataset/circom/dependencies/circomlib/circuits/bitify.circom:32:9
   
32          out[i] <-- (in >> i) & 1;
            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The assigned signal `out[i]` is not constrained here.
33          out[i] * (out[i] -1 ) === 0;
            ---------------------------- The signal `out[i]` is constrained here.
   
   = For more details, see https://github.com/trailofbits/circomspect/blob/main/doc/analysis_passes.md#signal-assignment.
   = To ignore this type of result, use `--allow CS0005`.

400              X[eps][i] <-- XY[eps][0][i] - XY1[eps][0][i]; // each XY[eps][0] is in [-2^n, 2^n) so difference is in [-2^{n+1}, 2^{n+1})
                 ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The assigned signal `X[eps][i]` is not constrained here.
401              X_range_checks[eps][i] = Num2Bits(n+2);
402              X_range_checks[eps][i].in <== X[eps][i] + (1<<(n+1)); // X[eps][i] should be between [-2^{n+1}, 2^{n+1})

    /home/tom/development/state-of-zk-security-tools/zksec/bugs/zkbugs/dataset/circom/dependencies/circomlib/circuits/comparators.circom:94:21

note[CS0003]: Comparisons with field elements greater than `p/2` may produce unexpected results.
     /home/tom/development/state-of-zk-security-tools/zksec/bugs/zkbugs/dataset/circom/succinctlabs/telepathy-circuits/trailofbits_incorrect_handling_of_point_doubling_can_allow_signature_forgery/circuits/pairing/bigint.circom:921:21
    
921      for (var i = 0; i < la + lb -1; i++) {
                         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Field element comparison here.
    
    = Field elements are always normalized to the interval `(-p/2, p/2]` before they are compared.
    = For more details, see https://github.com/trailofbits/circomspect/blob/main/doc/analysis_passes.md#field-element-comparison.

68      lt.in[0] <== a;
                     ^ This input to `LessThan` should be constrained to `n` bits.
   
   = For more details, see https://github.com/trailofbits/circomspect/blob/main/doc/analysis_passes.md#unconstrained-less-than.
   = To ignore this type of result, use `--allow CS0014`.
